General.Name: Ningbo Lehui International Engineering Equipment Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Ningbo Lehui International Engineering Equipment Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sales of beer brewing and packaging equipment, beverage pre-processing and packaging equipment, and dairy packaging equipment in China and internationally. It offers scale brewery equipment, including raw material handling systems, brew house, fermentation and cellar, filtration, bottling and canning line, keg and cask filling line equipment, as well as automation technology products, including automation engineering, conveying, E&I engineering, energy management, line performance analyzing, OEM machine control, machine control, manufacture executing, process control, and renovating and reconstructing systems; and brewery turnkey services. The company also provides packaging systems; beverage equipment comprising pet-filling technology, and filling peripherals and core process units; and dairy beverage products consists of cup filling sealing machines, cup form fill sealing machines, and bottle filling cap sealing machines. In addition, it offers bio and food equipment consisting of fermentation tank and stainless-steel vessels, laser-welded plates, module OEM systems, and gelatin equipment; dairy equipment, as well as full water immersion retorts, lateral shower retorts, laboratory pilot retorting equipment, multifunctional retorts, and top shower retorts. Further, the company provides maintenance and support services; and spare parts. Ningbo Lehui International Engineering Equipment Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in Ningbo, China.
General.Address: Xiangxi Electromechanical Ind. Park, Ningbo, China, 315722
